abstract: After a software update, iPhones that have been modified do, as Apple warned, turn into bricks. The company must prepare for a long, nasty fight with its own customers.
snippet: After a software update, iPhones that have been modified do, as Apple warned, turn into bricks. The company must prepare for a long, nasty fight with its own customers.
lead_paragraph: There is something futile about the way Apple appears to be fighting some of its most ardent fans, those who want to use the full capabilities of the iPhone.

headline.main: Steve Jobs Girds for the Long iPhone War
